name: Dino Rush (Edu, Ryder)
description:
Sadly this version of the game is broken :/

The button for level 04 loads level 02 which makes impossible to play the last 2 levels

if you wanna check it out the full game, play it on gotm.io, it's pretty much the same jam version of the game but the button now works

https://gotm.io/edu-n-ryder/dino-rush

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Dino Rush is a 3d platformer inspired by the classics from the Nintendo 64.

Pass through different levels while going through the evolution of the dinosaurs, following the different ages of a little egg friend.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS

Arrows Keys / WASD / L-Stick - Move the character

Space / A - Jump

Mouse / R-Stick - Control the camera

R - Restart the level

--------------------------------

HOW TO PLAY

Finish the level - 1 star

Finish the level and get all the fruits - 2 stars

Finish the level on the minimum time with all the fruits - 3 stars

you need 1 star to unlock the next level

---------------------------------------

CREDITS

The game was made in 1 week by @edusilvart and @GoruposStudios for the Go Godot Game Jam 03

Font used is Anglerhead by doggybag
